item.title: Screen Watch Dog v1.14 Released
item.description: Screen Watch Dog App      OR     Download as Install Package You are probably wondering where are versions 1.12 and 1.13. Fasten your seatbelts I will tell you a story. Once version 1.11 was out and we started testing with a small group of Beta testers we found out that eventually, the computer would go to sleep and monitoring would stop working. So most of the work in v 1.12 was done to add “No Sleep Mode” functionality.

item.title: Screen Watch Dog v1.11 Released
item.description: Screen Watch Dog App This little application will help you to monitor your screen while you are not looking at it. Here is how you can use it: 1. Move the main Application window to the screen you wish to monitor. 2. Press the button 'Select watch bounds'. 3. Press and hold the left mouse button. 4. Draw a rectangle across your area of interest. 5. Release the left mouse button.
